gwt.g2d.client.graphics.canvas
Class CanvasPixelArray

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      gwt.g2d.client.graphics.canvas.CanvasPixelArray

public final class CanvasPixelArray
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

Adapter for accessing the canvas pixel array object.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

Method Detail

as

public static CanvasPixelArray as(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject pixelArray)
Casts the JavaScriptObject into a CanvasPixelArray. Requires: the given JavaScriptObject must be an instance of CanvasPixelArray.

Parameters:
pixelArray -

getLength

public int getLength()
Gets the length the pixel array, which is height * width * 4.

getData

public int getData(int index)
Gets the pixel color value at the given index.

Parameters:
index - 0 based index. index 0 to 3 represents the R, G, B, A values of the top left pixel, and index 4 to 7 represents the color values of the next pixel to the right of the top left pixel.
Returns:
the color value at the given index.

setData

public void setData(int index,
                    int data)
Sets the pixel color value at the given index.

Parameters:
index - 0 based index. index 0 to 3 represents the R, G, B, A values of the top left pixel, and index 4 to 7 represents the color values of the next pixel to the right of the top left pixel.
data - the color value at the given index.
